item.title: Charley add a quote by Ian Fleming
item.description: "You only live twice: Once when you're born And once when you look death in the face." -- Ian Fleming

item.title: Charley add a quote by Ian Fleming
item.description: "Bond reflected that good Americans were fine people and that most of them seemed to come from Texas." -- Ian Fleming

item.title: Charley add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Charley add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "He was going to live forever, or die in the attempt." -- Joseph Heller

item.title: Charley add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Charley add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Charley add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "From 30 feet away she looked like a lot of class. From 10 feet away she looked like something made up to be seen from 30 feet away." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Charley add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "There is no bad whiskey. There are only some whiskeys that aren't as good as others." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Charley add a quote by E. M. Forster
item.description: "It is fate that I am here,' George persisted, 'but you can call it Italy if it makes you less unhappy." -- E. M. Forster

item.title: Charley add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Charley add a quote by Boris Pasternak
item.description: "How wonderful to be alive, he thought. But why does it always hurt?" -- Boris Pasternak

item.title: Charley add a quote by Boris Pasternak
item.description: "I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them. " -- Boris Pasternak

item.title: Charley add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Charley add a quote by Marguerite Duras
item.description: "When the past is recaptured by the imagination, breath is put back into life." -- Marguerite Duras

item.title: Charley add a quote by E.M. Forster
item.description: "If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country." -- E.M. Forster

item.title: Charley add a quote by E.M. Forster
item.description: "If we act the truth the people who really love us are sure to come back to us in the long run" -- E.M. Forster

item.title: Charley add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past." -- George Orwell
